attributes.action: Reject plans to allow 16 year old voting in UK
attributes.additional_details: 16 yr olds are not adults and are currently restricted from participating in adult activities like smoking,drinking and more. Why put the pressure of adult decisions onto a child.16 yr olds have enough pressure on them already such has  exams and finding six form/college placements.Let them have the two years  to sort out their education before they are legally allowed to vote.
attributes.background: Reject plans to allow 16 yr olds voting in General elections.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Don't lower the voting age to 16: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733604

We call for a referendum before extending voting rights to 16 & 17-year-olds: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733679
